titles.title: Cladonema Timmsii, A New Species Of Hydromedusa (Cnidaria: Hydrozoa) From A Salt Lake In South Australia

descriptions.description: Gershwin, Lisa-Ann, Zeidler, Wolfgang (2008): Cladonema timmsii, a new species of hydromedusa (Cnidaria: Hydrozoa) from a salt lake in South Australia. Zootaxa 1826: 59-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.183111
